feed.title: Brandon Albers - Business and Operations Analyst Portfolio
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my portfolio, where I showcase my work and skills as a Business and Operations Analyst. With a strong foundation in data analysis, process optimization, and forecasting, I focus on turning data insights into actionable strategies to drive business performance. My experience spans analyzing operational models, leading cost-reduction initiatives, and developing reporting systems using tools like SQL, Python, Power BI, and advanced Excel. This portfolio highlights key projects, including cost optimization models, freight margin forecasting tools, and business operations analysis. Each project is a reflection of my ability to deliver results by leveraging data-driven insights to support decision-making and process improvement. I am eager to contribute my expertise to future opportunities where I can continue to grow and add value in the field of business and operations analysis.
